_header: That may ye by Saint Martin see
Subjects: exempla ; Martin, saint; Anthony, saint; Macarius, saint
_description: Saints Martin, Anthony, and Machary: exempla in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
Heyr of sant martyn may ȝe seeffor in hys lyfe þer fynd
                    we…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…Of meknes to þat grett blyseþat to meke men ordand
                    ys

BodAsh42.First Lines:
þat may ȝe be saynte martyne seffor in his life þus
                    writen finde we…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Amen amen all say weOure lorde leue þat it swa
                    be
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Þat may ȝe be seint Martin seffor in his lyf fynde
                    we…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Amen Amen Amen sey weVre lord graunte þat hit so be.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: How þe deuel apperede to seynt Martyn (f. 171rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 246-7.

CULDd11.First Lines:
That may ȝe be seynt martyn sefor in his lyf fynde
                    we…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Amen amen sey now alle weoure lord graunte þat it so
                    be
CULDd11.Note: No break marked between this and preceding 245 in this MS.

CULGg531.First Lines:
þat may ȝe be saint martyn seeffor in hys lyue fynd
                    we…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Off meknes vnto þat blysþat to mekemen
                    graþhede es
CULGg531.Editions:
Small,  John,
                        ed.  
             English Metrical Homilies….
         Edinburgh: W. Paterson, 1862: 68-73.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
That may ȝe by sant martyn seffor in his lyue fynde
                    be…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Of moknes vnto þat blysThat to meke men graunted
                    es

BLHar2391.First Lines: Þat may ȝe se saynt auten sefor his lyfe þus fynd wryttyn we…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Amen Amen all say weOure lorde lene þat itt so be
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: In die Natalis domini (left margin f. 158v), plus “Tale” written above this.

HunHM129.First Lines:
Þat may ȝe by seint martyn seffor in his lyfe fynd
                    weþat as he was in orysoumCome þe fend as kynge with
                    croum…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Off mekenys in to þe blysÞat to meke men grauntyd
                    is
HunHM129.Note:
This MS begins text two lines later, treting first two lines above as
                    ending of 245; Separate heading
                    ‘Narracio’ and pointing hand to indicate new text for Machary (f.
                    13).
